{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=DGN2000|vs_id=2334}} [http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/1067559 On the whirlpool.net.au forums]
[http://japanesesoapbox.blogspot.com/2011/09/can-openwrt-save-my-netgear-dgn2000.html dmesg output] This device is presumed to use BCM6348S. OEM SerComm (YL600C-1.6) Per the manual, the default SSID is probably '''NETGEAR'''.
